ygData.subject: Re: on my plans
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for my absence, everyone, but I am very sick and couldn t get to post yesterday. As for the battle cruiser, I didn t say it can t land, I was merely mad

Sorry for my absence, everyone, but I am very sick and couldn't get 
to post yesterday.

As for the battle cruiser, I didn't say it can't land, I was merely 
mad about permission not being asked for it. However, I didn't know 
it was the same one that Prodigy asked me about, so I guess its fine 
now.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Prodigey child" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> what I was going to do with the new battle cruiser [with your 
permission] 
> take both of them apart and build a underwater city with both of 
them.
